column1: Vandœuvre-lès-Nancy (French pronunciation: ​[vɑ̃dœvʁ lɛ nɑ̃si]) is a commune in the Meurthe-et-Moselle department in north-eastern France. Its inhabitants are called Vandopériens.

column3: Vandœuvre is the second-largest commune in the Meurthe-et-Moselle department
column5: of which it is a suburb. These two cities belong to the same municipal area: Grand Nancy.

column1: The municipal market of Vandœuvre hosts 120–150 merchants and 6000–8000 visitors on Sunday mornings.
École Nationale Supérieure d'Agronomie et des Industries Alimentaires
École Supérieure des Sciences et Technologies de l'Ingénieur de Nancy
